subject: Swimming
lead_paragraph: Emma McKeon, Melanie Schlanger and the sisters Bronte and Cate Campbell of Australia set a world record (3 minutes 30.98 seconds) in the 4x100-meter freestyle relay on the first day of competition at the Commonwealth Games in Glasgow, Scotland.
snippet: Emma McKeon, Melanie Schlanger and the sisters Bronte and Cate Campbell of Australia set a world record (3 minutes 30.98 seconds) in the 4x100-meter freestyle relay on the first day of competition at the Commonwealth Games in Glasgow, Scotland.
